mapper.select: SELECT m.id "id", m. NAME "name", m.path "path" FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.update: update sys_user SET name=#{name}, dept_id=#{deptId}, sex=#{sex}, ch_name=#{chName}, address=#{address}, idcard=#{idcard}, home=#{home} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select w.status "status", u.name "name" from user_work w left JOIN sys_user u on u.id=w.user_id where w.work_id=#{id}

select w.id "id", w.status "status", date_format(e.date, '%Y-%c-%d' ) "date", e.local "local", e.info "info", e.remark from user_work w left JOIN emp_work e on w.work_id=e.id where w.user_id=#{id} and e.type=#{type}
mapper.update: update user_work set status='1' where id=#{id}
